text: Ryan Matthew Dunn (June 11, 1977 â€“ June 20, 2011) was an American stunt performer, television personality, actor and comedian. He was best known for being a member of the Jackass and Viva La Bam television programs. He died in car crash in West Goshen Township, Chester County, Pennsylvania. Police reported that Dunn was the driver. His blood alcohol level was 0.196%. That is more than twice the state's legal limit of 0.08%. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Accidental deaths in Pennsylvania Category:American television personalities Category:Entertainers from Ohio Category:Road accident deaths in the United States Category:People from Medina, Ohio
title: Ryan Dunn
